New Records: Evin Lewis scored 102 off 61 balls, the highest score in the match
West Indies won the match by 8 wickets (DLS method)
Charith Asalanka was named Player of the Series for Sri Lanka
Key Match Events: Avishka Fernando was dismissed for 34 runs off 50 balls
Charith Asalanka was dismissed for 6 runs off 3 balls
Evin Lewis' century was the main highlight for West Indies
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium in Kandy
West Indies elected to bowl first
The match was the 3rd ODI in the series
